entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 6 this afternoon. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature falling to minus 6 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 16 this afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing before morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Increasing cloudiness. High zero.
